name: turf-www
description: create the turf website and online documentation

scripts.deploy: npm run generateJson && npm run tidyConfig && cd template/turf-template && npm run build && node scripts/deploy
scripts.generateJson: documentation build -c documentation.yml turf/packages/turf-*/index.js -f json > scripts/tempConfig.json
scripts.test: npm run lintAPI && npm run build-test && npm run test-runner
